ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I installed Heritrix 1.0 and am very impressed! I am looking at using arcdump to work with the data inside arc files but it would be much easier for me if

Subject: Is it possible to write crawled files to disk instead of arc
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=125152663
X-Yahoo-Profile: bw2000uk

Hi, 
 
I installed Heritrix 1.0 and am very impressed! 
 
I am looking at using arcdump to work with the data inside arc files 
but it would be much easier for me if I could work with the raw 
files outside of the .arc file.  I tried disabling the arc writer in 
settings but then Heritrix seems to dispose of the downloaded co 
ntent without storing.  Any help would be greatly appreciated.  
 
Thanks
